description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.63xn1dV6ry0cZqlZ]{Attunement Surge (Su)}

When you have made significant progress attuning yourself to your stellar mode, you can sacrifice that greater attunement in exchange for momentary benefits.

While you have 2 attunement points in a stellar mode, you can expend 2 attunement points on your turn without spending an action to gain two effects until the beginning of your next turn. First, you gain benefits from that modeâ€™s stellar revelations as though you were fully attuned, rather than attuned. Second, you gain a benefit based on which mode you are attuned to.

Resistance: In addition to granting you DR, resistance mode also grants you resistance 1 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic damage. This increases by 1 for every 6 solarian levels you have. This energy resistance stacks with one other source of energy resistance you have (such as from equipment).

modifiers.name: Attunement Surge (Su) - Resistance - Acid
modifiers.notes: There is currently no way to stack Energy Resistance modifiers. After applying damage, refund damage equal to the value of either the Energy Resistance of this feature, or the highest other functioning Energy Resistance available. Whichever is lower. (These values can be viewed by hovering over the Energy Resistance field in sheet's Attributes tab)
